<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>proc_rec_slip_item</collection><condition>new global.ProcurementUtils().shouldCreateAssetsFromRSL(current);</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Create Movement Stock_OLD</name><order>1000</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[var type = (new AssetUtils()).getAssetOrConsumable(current.purchase_line.model);
gs.log("Le type d'asset est: "+ type + " pour le modèle "+ current.purchase_line.model,"Create Movement Stock");

if(type != 'software'){
	gs.log("Appel du programme StockMovementtUtils","Create Movement Stock");
	(new StockMovementUtils()).createRecMovementStock(current.purchase_line, current, current.quantity,type);
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>BL62F3EN</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-07-06 10:33:06</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ce1a90ce83666e1048d6ccc6feaad350</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create Movement Stock_OLD</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="stock movement" source="x_606284_stock_mov">378f720b835a6a9048d6ccc6feaad37c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="stock movement">378f720b835a6a9048d6ccc6feaad37c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_ce1a90ce83666e1048d6ccc6feaad350</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>BL62F3EN</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-11-01 10:30:23</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=ce1a90ce83666e1048d6ccc6feaad350"/></record_update>
